greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = T_{n}(n-1) where T_{n}(x) is a Chebyshev polynomial of the first kind.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..351
formula: a(n) = n * Sum_{k=0..n} (2*n-4)^k * binomial(n+k,2*k)/(n+k) for n > 0. - _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 05 2021
program: (PARI) a(n) = if(n==0, 1, n*sum(k=0, n, (2*n-4)^k*binomial(n+k, 2*k)/(n+k))); \\ _Seiichi Manyama_, Mar 05 2021
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Jan 05 2019
